channel.title: Grand Exchange Help
channel.description:
so i added G.E and now i need help, with correct id's for the search bar things.
E.G when i search whip in G.E i click on the whip and it brings a shortbow up??
please help.
oh and correct prices would also be a great help...
im using palidino76 base.
oh and another thing - how to add a decent PvN (Player V Npc)
Please help me with the G.E and/or the other problems
EDIT: Also its when i offer something it offers a null or different item
EDIT2: all of above fixed apart from decent PvN
ok while above is fixed (apart from PvN)
theres another problem with ge, when i try to sell/buy and item it ONLY shows a null or other object :( how to fix?
btw when i click on the button sell or buy it comes up with correct object

item.title: Grand Exchange Help
